ResearchProjectDef.label: starflight basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct the structural and supportive elements of a starship. This is the first step in building a ship to leave this star system.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
Escaping from this planet - it would be freedom at last, and maybe a return home.

But before you can even consider interstellar spaceflight, you'll need to reach orbit. The minimum requirements for a spaceworthy craft are a rocket engine, a ship bridge, basic sensors, and a shuttle bay. To survive in space, your colonists will also need either a life-support system or EVA suits.

The amount of chemfuel required to launch a ship into orbit depends on its size. Larger ships may need multiple rocket engines, one per 1,000 units of chemfuel.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ship fission reactor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Burn uranium fuel pods for long-term power.

ResearchProjectDef.label: rocket propulsion
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct chemical engines for a ship. These can reach orbit, but no further.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Johnson-Tanaka Drive
ResearchProjectDef.description: Understand the principles behind the reactionless Johnson-Tanaka drive, capable of interplanetary and interstellar travel.\nNote: Actually constructing the drive will require an Entanglement Manifold, a very rare artifact.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ship navigation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allow your colonists to pilot a ship, with basic computer assistance.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ship computer core
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows coercing an existing AI persona into a usable ship computer core for long-range guidance.

ResearchProjectDef.label: afterlife casket
ResearchProjectDef.description: Utilize mechanites to break down a deceased body and create a formgel which mimics its biological functions - allowing the dead to live again.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic ship sensors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct sensors for a ship, capable of basic navigation and observing areas from orbit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced ship sensors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct advanced sensors for a ship, capable of scanning the interior of enemy ships.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ship life support
ResearchProjectDef.description: Recycle oxygen to keep non-cryptosleeping colonists alive.

ResearchProjectDef.label: EVA suits
ResearchProjectDef.description: Self-contained life support systems allow colonists to survive in outer space.

ResearchProjectDef.label: EVA powered armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Apply life-support technology to powered armor, producing an armored suit which allows its occupant to survive in outer space.

ResearchProjectDef.label: crittersleep caskets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct crittersleep caskets, which can hold multiple small animals, and cryptonests for holding eggs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: escape pods
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct a specialized cryptosleep casket capable of surviving atmospheric re-entry, and which does not need to be opened manually. It would be a good idea to have at least one aboard a starship.

ResearchProjectDef.label: capacitor arrays
ResearchProjectDef.description: Utilize the dielectric properties of plasteel for efficient, high-capacity energy storage.

ResearchProjectDef.label: salvage bay
ResearchProjectDef.description: Utilize an automated gantry and swarms of tug drones to quickly retrieve salvage after a space battle.

ResearchProjectDef.label: hullfoam
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft hullfoam, a sprayable substance that hardens into airtight barriers. Useful for quickly patching holes in starships.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ship shields
ResearchProjectDef.description: Protect your ship with a momentum-repulsor field.

ResearchProjectDef.label: cloaking device
ResearchProjectDef.description: Hide your ship's heat emissions, preventing enemies from noticing you.

ResearchProjectDef.label: shuttle bay
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct shuttle docking bays, for ferrying cargo to and from a ship.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Personal Shuttle
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct personal shuttles, which act much like reusable transport pods.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cargo Shuttle
ResearchProjectDef.description: Miniaturized ship components allow cargo shuttles to carry much more weight than simpler models.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heavy Cargo Shuttle
ResearchProjectDef.description: Quickly transport a caravan's worth of goods with this advanced cargo shuttle.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Superheavy Dropship
ResearchProjectDef.description: Deliver tonnes of goods, or an entire battalion of marines, with this superheavy shuttle.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ship cannons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct ballistic slugthrowers for ship-to-ship combat. Unlike energy weapons, these require ammo but need almost no cooling.

ResearchProjectDef.label: laser turrets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct small lasers for ship-to-ship combat. Highly damaging but only usable at short range. Can intercept torpedoes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: plasma turrets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct small plasma cannons for ship-to-ship combat. These weapons are balanced and most effective at intermediate range.

ResearchProjectDef.label: railgun turrets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct small railguns for ship-to-ship combat. Most effective at long range.

ResearchProjectDef.label: heatsinks
ResearchProjectDef.description: Keep your ship's weapons and shields operational longer by channeling their heat into a heatsink.

ResearchProjectDef.label: purge ports
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct a specialized heatsink which rapidly bleeds stored heat by dumping silver.

ResearchProjectDef.label: cruiser armaments
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct larger versions of ship turrets, suitable for a mid-sized cruiser.

ResearchProjectDef.label: capital ship armaments
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct modular spinal-mount weapons, typically seen only on capital ships.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ship torpedoes
ResearchProjectDef.description: Launch powerful torpedoes at enemy ships. Effective at overwhelming shields.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic holodeck
ResearchProjectDef.description: Improvise a holodeck from simple components.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced holodeck
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct an improved holodeck with modern, high-resolution projectors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: sapient holodeck
ResearchProjectDef.description: Coerce a machine persona into creating endlessly entertaining simulations for your colonists.
